title: Legibility
content:
How do these fonts work for you?

My basis is legibility and exactly how much letterform information we need for the letter to be legible.

Any comments would be great.

Thanks

author: minty5

comments.content: Do you have many fonts in there ?
Its one page with two fonts.

I have diecided to go with the top font (please see original attachment) but I need help with my name.

What do you think about these name?

Indubitable

Clear Cut

Fundemental
